original_title: I Can See the Sun But I Can't Feel It Yet
overview: A nightmare in reverie: five young queer people are admitted into a clinic to undergo conversion therapy. Enduring several different and harrowing methods to change their sexual orientation and/or gender identity, the sterile space of abject trauma struggles to suppress the abundance and beauty of queer love. Striking images burst through like a new Un chant d'amour (1975).
title: I Can See the Sun But I Can't Feel It Yet
